verses.verse: Now these <S%H428><s%> are the names <S%H8034><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> who came <S%H935><s%> to Egypt <S%H4714><s%> with Jacob; <S%H3290><s%> they came <S%H935><s%> each <S%H376><s%> one <S%H376><s%> with his household: <S%H1004><s%>
Reuben, <S%H7205><s%> Simeon, <S%H8095><s%> Levi <S%H3878><s%> and Judah; <S%H3063><s%>
Issachar, <S%H3485><s%> Zebulun <S%H2074><s%> and Benjamin; <S%H1144><s%>
Dan <S%H1835><s%> and Naphtali, <S%H5321><s%> Gad <S%H1410><s%> and Asher. <S%H836><s%>

And all <S%H3605><s%> the persons <S%H5315><s%> who came <S%H3318><s%> from the loins <S%H3409><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%> were seventy <S%H7657><s%> in number, <S%H5315><s%> but Joseph <S%H3130><s%> was [already] in Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>
And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> died, <S%H4191><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> his brothers <S%H251><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> that generation.

But the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> were fruitful <S%H6509><s%> and increased <S%H8317><s%> greatly, <S%H8317><s%> and multiplied, <S%H7235><s%> and became <S%H6105><s%> exceedingly <S%H3966><s%> mighty, <S%H6105><s%> so that the land <S%H776><s%> was filled <S%H4390><s%> with them.
Now a new <S%H2319><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> arose <S%H6965><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> who <S%H834><s%> did not know <S%H3045><s%> Joseph. <S%H3130><s%>

And he said <S%H559><s%> to his people, <S%H5971><s%> "Behold, <S%H2009><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> are more <S%H7227><s%> and mightier <S%H6099><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> we.

"Come, <S%H3051><s%> let us deal <S%H2449><s%> wisely <S%H2449><s%> with them, lest <S%H6435><s%> they multiply <S%H7235><s%> and in the event <S%H1961><s%> <S%H3588><s%> <S%H7122><s%> of war, <S%H4421><s%> they also <S%H1571><s%> join <S%H3254><s%> themselves to those who <S%H834><s%> hate <S%H8130><s%> us, and fight <S%H3898><s%> against us, and depart <S%H5927><s%> from the land. <S%H776><s%>"

So they appointed <S%H7760><s%> taskmasters <S%H8269><s%> <S%H4522><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> them to afflict <S%H6031><s%> them with hard <S%H5450><s%> labor. <S%H5450><s%> And they built <S%H1129><s%> for Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> storage <S%H4543><s%> cities, <S%H5892><s%> Pithom <S%H6619><s%> and Raamses. <S%H7486><s%>

But the more <S%H9201><s%> they afflicted <S%H6031><s%> them, the more <S%H3651><s%> they multiplied <S%H7235><s%> and the more <S%H3651><s%> they spread <S%H6555><s%> out, so that they were in dread <S%H6973><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>
And the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> compelled the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> to labor <S%H5647><s%> rigorously; <S%H6531><s%>

and they made <S%H4843><s%> their lives <S%H9132><s%> bitter <S%H4843><s%> with hard <S%H7186><s%> labor <S%H5656><s%> in mortar <S%H2563><s%> and bricks <S%H3843><s%> and at all <S%H3605><s%> [kinds] of labor <S%H5656><s%> in the field, <S%H7704><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> their labors <S%H5656><s%> which <S%H834><s%> they rigorously <S%H6531><s%> imposed <S%H5647><s%> on them.

Then the king <S%H4428><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> to the Hebrew <S%H5680><s%> midwives, <S%H3205><s%> one <S%H259><s%> of whom <S%H834><s%> was named <S%H8034><s%> Shiphrah, <S%H8236><s%> and the other <S%H8145><s%> was named <S%H8034><s%> Puah; <S%H6326><s%>

and he said, <S%H559><s%> "When you are helping the Hebrew <S%H5680><s%> women <S%H5680><s%> to give <S%H3205><s%> birth <S%H3205><s%> and see <S%H7200><s%> [them] upon the birthstool, <S%H70><s%> if <S%H518><s%> it is a son, <S%H1121><s%> then you shall put <S%H4191><s%> him to death; <S%H4191><s%> but if <S%H518><s%> it is a daughter, <S%H1323><s%> then she shall live. <S%H2421><s%>"

But the midwives <S%H3205><s%> feared <S%H3372><s%> God, <S%H430><s%> and did not do <S%H6213><s%> as the king <S%H4428><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> had commanded <S%H1696><s%> them, but let the boys <S%H3206><s%> live. <S%H2421><s%>

So the king <S%H4428><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> for the midwives, <S%H3205><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to them, "Why <S%H4069><s%> have you done <S%H6213><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> thing, <S%H1697><s%> and let the boys <S%H3206><s%> live <S%H2421><s%>?"

And the midwives <S%H3205><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> "Because <S%H3588><s%> the Hebrew <S%H5680><s%> women <S%H5680><s%> are not as the Egyptian <S%H4713><s%> women; <S%H802><s%> for they are vigorous, <S%H2422><s%> and they give <S%H3205><s%> birth <S%H3205><s%> before <S%H2962><s%> the midwife <S%H3205><s%> can <S%H935><s%> get <S%H935><s%> to them."
So God <S%H430><s%> was good <S%H3190><s%> to the midwives, <S%H3205><s%> and the people <S%H5971><s%> multiplied, <S%H7235><s%> and became <S%H6105><s%> very <S%H3966><s%> mighty. <S%H6105><s%>
And it came <S%H1961><s%> about because <S%H3588><s%> the midwives <S%H3205><s%> feared <S%H3372><s%> God, <S%H430><s%> that He established <S%H6213><s%> households <S%H1004><s%> for them.

Then Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> his people, <S%H5971><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Every <S%H3605><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> who is born <S%H3209><s%> you are to cast <S%H7993><s%> into the Nile, <S%H2975><s%> and every <S%H3605><s%> daughter <S%H1323><s%> you are to keep <S%H2421><s%> alive. <S%H2421><s%>"
